notes.text:
This update for wireshark fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-1161: Fixed crash in ISO 15765 and ISO 10681 dissector (bsc#1208914).
  
Update to 3.6.12:
* https://www.wireshark.org/docs/relnotes/wireshark-3.6.12.html
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: ISO 15765 and ISO 10681 dissector crash in Wireshark 4.0.0 to 4.0.3 and 3.6.0 to 3.6.11 allows denial of service via packet injection or crafted capture file
notes.title: Vulnerability description
